MMDA reminders:The NO CONTACT POLICY is now in full force. This means that no MMDA traffic enforcer will flag down any driver for any traffic violation on the road but instead, will monitor violations onscreen via the CCTV camera. Consequently, car registered owners will be informed of violations via post mail and shall be given only 5 days to contest the violations. If the MMDA office does not receive any contest after 10 days, MMDA shall effect a prescribed fine and shall indicate or show the fine during registration renewal.

Mayon volcano update today live now #eruptionvolcanmayon #BulkangMayon #tvnews. Videos or photos of lava fountaining in Mayon are NOT current. Lava fountaining briefly occurred during the 2018 eruption and more spectacularly occurred for longer and intense periods during the 2000 and 2001 eruptions. These are the last eruptions in which fountaining occurred.

Ibinalita ngayon lang sa ibang bansa ang nakita sa satellite na posibleng tamaan ng pinakamalakas na Typhoon, Earthquake(Magnitude 8-9) na sanhi ng pagkakaroon ng pinakamalakas na Tsunami at Landslide ito ay tatama sa Saudi Arabia, Kuwait,Oman,Yemen,UAE at sa iba pang bahagi ng Arab Country. Totoo man or hindi dapat parin nating ipagdasal ang kaligtasan ng mga taong naninirahan sa nasabing mga bansa lalo na sa ating mga kababayan. PS: We are not spreading the fake news but the main point on this post is para mapag ingat yung mga tao sa bawat kalamidad. Pwede nating isipin or sabihing FAKE NEWS pero mas mabuti yung handa tayo at alam natin yung posibleng kalamidad na darating sa atin at wag makakalimot sa taas ALLAH (s.w)‚Ä¶ -Allahu A‚Äôlam (sic)(Just now, it has been reported overseas what was seen in a satellite as a possible super typhoon, earthquake (magnitude 8-9) that would cause a strong tsunami and a landslide, which would hit Saudi Arabia, Kuwait,Oman,Yemen,UAE and other parts of the Arab Country. True or not, we should still pray for the safety of the people living in the said countries, specially that of our fellow Filipinos. NALAMAN NARIN SAWAKAS ANG TUNAY AT IBEDENSYA NG PANDARAYA Ni ROBREDO at ROXAS KAY MARCOS at DUTERTE (The real evidence of cheating by Robredo and Roxas of Marcos and Duterte has been finally discovered.) Noong 2016 elections nagpa online survey po kami kung sino ang iboboto ng mga Pilipino bilang Presidente at Bise Presidente. Nagulat po kami sa resulta sa Vice President, imbes na si Bongbong Marcos o Alan Peter Cayetano, si Leni Robredo ang nanguna. Ngunit nung tinignan namin ang resulta at pinag aralan isa isa ang mga sumagot, lumabas ang pandaraya nga kampo ni Robredo. Panoorin nyo po itong video na ito para makita ang tunay na honesty at integrity ng mga kandidato ng oposisyon.Credit to: Mindavote (On the 2016 elections, we conducted an online survey to find out who the Filipinos vote for as president and vice president. We were shocked at the results of the vote for vice president, instead of Bongbong Marcos or Alan Peter Cayetano, Leni Robredo emerged on top. But when we checked the results and studied each of the respondents, the cheating of the camp of Robredo was found. Watch this video to see the real honesty and integrity of the candidates of the opposition. Credit to: Mindavote)
